tutorial.text: Good day! My name is Smam and I can see it's your first time you're trying to open a gastronomy business. Beginning anything can be hard. I'm here to make your work easier. But you are the one making decisions. Is this your first time playing this game?

responses.text: Oh excellent. In that let's dive right in and pick a location to open your business!

No worries. That's what I'm here for. I will be your personal assistant and present to you everything you need to decide on and all you gotta do is to tell me whether you agree or not. I will take care of the rest.
